In this American English pronunciation video,

Today’s video is all about you. Almost 60
people sent in videos practicing their English,

answering the question “What do you love?”
People shared their art, their music, their

book collections. Some videos were shot outside
in beautiful places, and some were shot inside

in people’s homes. It was so fun learning
more about you guys. Thank you so much for

If you missed this video challenge, be sure
to sign up for my mailing list. You’ll get

an email every week with a free English lesson,
as well as reminders about things like: send

me a video for a video challenge. It’s a
great way to keep in touch. I also share a

little bit about my personal life so you can
learn about American culture. To sign up,

And now, without further ado, here are
the results of the
the “What do you love?” video challenge.
